Package main

Class OppositionTeam

java.lang.Object
main.OppositionTeam
public class OppositionTeam extends Object
Represents an opposition team in a match. Manages the creation, retrieval, and disposal of the opposition team. Provides methods to retrieve information about the opposition team.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<String>
    nameString
    ArrayList that stores the names of the athletes from the opposition team

    opTeam

    teamName
